definitions: a person who imitates someone or their actions or words, especially in order to entertain or ridicule

examples.text: as a mimicker of voices I am unrivaled

definitions: an animal or plant that imitates the behavior or actions of another

examples.text: lyrebirds are magnificent mimickers of other birds and noises

shortDefinitions: animal or plant that imitates behaviour or actions of another

definitions: a disease that exhibits symptoms that bear a deceptive resemblance to those of another disease

examples.text: a mimicker of dementia is severe depression
syphilis is considered the great mimicker

shortDefinitions: disease exhibiting symptoms bearing deceptive resemblance to another disease

definitions: a drug or other substance that replicates the physiological effects of another substance
shortDefinitions: drug that replicates physiological effects of another substance
